title: ID this beautiful type
content:
can anyone ID this type? its gorgeous!  
thanx in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [e\_and\_a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091113121817/http:/typophile.com/files/e_and_a.jpg) | 35.94 KB |
author: bagopeas

comments.content:
We’ve had this ’ampersand’ request before but I didn’t have any luck finding it.

The “&” is very close to the one included with [Eloquent Swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20091113121817/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000117#characters) from Jukebox. The “E” and “A” are likely custom.
god its gorgeous! but pistilla isnt digital :(
The best approximation for Pistilli is [Eloquent](http://web.archive.org/web/20091113121817/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000117) by Jason Walcott, as said above.
